title: Is Syndra's E buggy to anyone else?

replies.body: Depends what you mean by buggy, i've found a lot of times it doesn't stun or a wide range of other small things but feel free to clarify!

> Depends what you mean by buggy, i've found a lot of times it doesn't stun or a wide range of other small things but feel free to clarify!

Nearly everytime I use her Q+E combo, as soon as her E animation happens, the screen freezes for a split second and then next thing I know my opponent is stunned. Like, I very rarely see her sphere actually move forward.

I feel like that's on your end or a small client bug you have, you could try repairing the client? A lot of the issues with Syndra is interactions with other champions spells/abilities. Once you learn them you'll understand when to use certain spells like say yasuo's windwall
idk but sometimes when i press Q the q wont go off with the Q-E combo stun

> idk but sometimes when i press Q the q wont go off with the Q-E combo stun

That also happens to me sometimes, it's really strange
